availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles Holliday Wheeler (Oldham County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Oldham County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Ashby Wheeler in Oldham County on December 22, 1842. Father of Washington Wheeler, Franklin Wheeler, Margaret Wheeler, and Mary Wheeler. Farmer in Oldham County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, p. 18.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Oldham County Marriages, Film #000482447.
Find A Grave, "Charles Holliday Wheeler (unknown-July 1, 1890)," Memorial #69527802, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/69527802 (accessed August 13, 2018).
